about_the_game:
"Warship Jolly Roger" is a single-player, narrative-driven action-adventure game set in a universe brimming with space opera aesthetics. Players traverse diverse worlds, facing unexpected encounters and navigating environments that range from breathtakingly beautiful to utterly uninhabitable. The crux of your survival and success lies in the camaraderie and skill set of your crew as you undertake missions filled with danger and discovery.



The Universe:
Embark on a journey across the cosmos where each planet you visit offers unique challenges and environments. From the icy plains of distant moons to the searing heat of forgotten suns, adaptability and resourcefulness are your best assets. Encounter alien species, ancient relics, and cosmic phenomena that will both aid and hinder your quest.



Your Crew:
Jon Tiberius Munro: An ex-officer haunted by his past, driven by the desire to reunite with his children. His complex character, filled with regret and determination, forms the heart of the narrative.


Alisa Rinaldi: A rebellious and skilled mechanic, Alisa's prowess in combat and engineering makes her an invaluable asset. Her strong will is a product of the fractured political landscape she navigated in System Seven.


Nikolai Kowalski: The dark horse of the group, Nikolai's cynical and manipulative nature adds layers of complexity. His ambiguous motivations and loyalties create intriguing interpersonal dynamics.


Trace: A robotics prodigy with a tragic past, Trace's advanced skills and youthful optimism provide a beacon of hope amidst the darkness. His abilities extend beyond the ordinary, making him a unique asset.


The Journey:
Their journey begins with a daring prison escape, leading them to commandeer the most powerful star cruiser in the galaxy: the Warship Jolly Roger. Evading galactic authorities, they navigate their complicated relationships and histories, with each character's personal story adding depth to the overarching narrative.



Gameplay Experience:
"Warship Jolly Roger" offers a blend of action, strategy, and narrative depth. Engage in intense space battles, strategize your next move, and delve into the rich backstories of each crew member. The focus on character-driven storytelling, set against the backdrop of interstellar conflict and political intrigue, creates an immersive experience that appeals to fans of both action and deep narrative.



Embark on this interstellar odyssey, where the unknown lurks around every corner, and the fate of the galaxy rests in your hands. Welcome aboard the Warship Jolly Roger.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770

short_description: Jon Munro, ex-officer seeking his family; Alisa Rinaldi, rebel mechanic; Nikolai Kowalski, cunning smuggler; Trace, jailed robotics prodigy. United in a prison escape, they command the Warship Jolly Roger, dodging galactic authorities in an epic space opera game.
